name: Shacknews White and Round
description:
A white version of Bamtam's suggested style ( http://www.shacknews.com/chatty?id=25369440#itemanchor_25369440 ), that uses curved corners everywhere, with a few other tweeks. Based off of ovrlrd version of ysbreaker's style.
see http://userstyles.org/styles/44642 and http://userstyles.org/styles/44648
Most posts have a blue title bar, informative have purple, NWS have red, offtopic have green, and political should have orange.
